data.description:
Experience the BioDigital Human in extended reality for the best immersive experience in anatomy education.
Trusted by 3,000,000+ students from nearly 5,000 institutions, BioDigital is used globally by leading medical schools, health systems, medical device, pharmaceutical and education companies. Organizations transforming education with BioDigital XR include AstraZeneca, Boston Scientific, Google, Smile Train, WL Gore, and GSK.
Features include:
- Comprehensive Male & Female 3D Anatomy Models
- Gross Anatomy Lab
- Multi-User Learning Experience 
- 4 modes: hide, move, label, select
- Virtual hands to manipulate anatomical structures, providing unprecedented engagement with a virtual body in 3D space.
- Robust system layer sliders
- Latin terms and descriptions 
- Spacious environments
- Teleportation 
- Optional audio narration to enhance the experience for those who prefer auditory learning.

Male & Female Anatomy Systems:
- Cardiovascular
- Connective tissue
- Muscular
- Digestive
- Lymphatic
- Endocrine
- Nervous
- Skeletal
- Respiratory
- Reproductive
- Urinary

Regional Anatomy
- Head & Neck
- Back
- Upper Limb
- Lower Limb
- Male Thorax
- Male Abdomen
- Male Pelvis
- Female Thorax
- Female Abdomen
- Female Pelvis

Additional Models
- Beating heart
- Brain
- Skin cube

Why BioDigital XR?
- Provides a safe to fail learning experience for learners
- proven to improve learning outcomes and increase engagement
- makes spatial relationships real for learners
- complements cadaver dissection
- more cost effective

changelog.change_log:
2.0.0 Release
Added Gross Anatomy Lab and MultiUser support.
We've added Visibility Layers Sliders and updated the Female Regional models with our latest v18 Base Anatomy

All new Male and Female Regional and System anatomy models. 
Updated UX, teleport, and overall app improvements.
All new Systems and Regional models!  Improved interactions, including teleport.
Fixed Google Sign In, and various other minor bug fixes
fixed Google Sign In and other various improvements
Enhanced UX for interacting with models.
Enhanced UX for interacting with models.
